nodes.text: Stim stabilizers were a type of medicine kept in emergency medpacs. During the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Jedi Padawan Reath Silas used one on the Byne Guild pilot Affie Hollow to heal frostbite Hollow had sustained while holding a freezing coaxium regulator that had been knocked out of its mooring. Stabilizers were injected into patients' necks, and took effect in mere seconds. They could be used on humans.
